title: Rotating game mode queue now live!

replies.body:
Yup, not available in the new client. And I was excited using the new client too. If you want to use the old client, just click on the 'Launch legacy client' on the bottom right corner of the new client.

If that didn't work (like mine), go to your League of Legends folder (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends) and double click lol.launcher.exe, that will launch the old client instead, and you'll get to play the Rotating game mode queue.

You've been working on the new client for how long and you couldn't even factor in the events? seriously Riot, one day you MIGHT get something right.. how are those new maps coming along.. oh wait.. that's HOTS..

"Beta" 

They had time to work this stuff out up to this point.
Alpha is an incomplete products being build and tested at the same time. Beta is for testing out a complete product that has not been bug tested, but for the most part works.

in this case, it's not just that it does not work, it is non exsistant.
Thank fuck someone gets it, clearly the 4 people that downvoted me and this other moron don't, and this is why Riot don't pull their heads out of their ass, unearned positive feedback.
WHY TF DO WE HAVE ASCENSION FOR TWO WEEKENDS
how can i play this game mode on my mac T.T
_riot has so much money and they cant even update the dam game screen im over it {{summoner:3}}
why cant i see ascension in the new client?
It's not available on the new client. And apparently I can't access the legacy client so how am I spose to play my favorite game mode huh?
When you go to log in to the new client there should be an option near the bottom to instead launch the legacy client.
